reviews.text: Very expensive for no reason.The sold me a $6 12 oz iced coffee that the sugar was at the bottom of the cup more milk then coffee when a splash was what I asked. When I tried to get I what I paid for I was told to leave.

Dining at a Colombian restaurant is always a blast! The food is bursting with flavor and the portions are huge. The atmosphere is super inviting and the service is always friendly here. Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for some tasty street food or a full-on traditional meal, this restaurant are the perfect spot for an authentic Latin American dining experience,
